snippet: South Africa will look to produce a dominant series display against Sri Lanka, starting with the first test in Port Elizabeth on Monday, to build on last month's triumph in Australia....
lead_paragraph: South Africa will look to produce a dominant series display against Sri Lanka, starting with the first test in Port Elizabeth on Monday, to build on last month's triumph in Australia.

headline.main: Cricket-South Africa Favourites to Beat Visiting Sri Lanka
headline.print_headline: Cricket-South Africa Favourites to Beat Visiting Sri Lanka
